thread.title: Nicholas C Acton
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Nicholas C Acton

author: Nicholas C Acton
title: Nicholas C Acton
text: We received much help finding the perfect couch. We visited both the Warren location and the Auburn Hills location. Auburn Hills had a gentleman who was a little pushy regarding closing now which we were not a fan of. I don't like being pressured into a decision on the spot. If I get this again I will not return.
